contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 22, 2014 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest blaenavon-contest-1st-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Contest moved from Blaenavon Workmens' Hall to Merthyr Tydfil Leisure Centre.
Best Instrumentalist: Paul Eddy (soprano) - Parc & Dare
2014: Welsh League Champion: Goodwick Brass Runner-Up: Lewis Merthyr
March 19, 2014, 6:58 p.m. Nov. 25, 2014, 9:26 a.m.
1 Goodwick Brass Matthew Jenkins Purcell Variations [Downie]
2 Parc and Dare Band Andrew Jones Les Preludes [arr. Rimmer]
3 Blaenavon Town Band Jamie Jones Mountain Views
4 Lewis Merthyr Band Gavin Pritchard Variations for Brass Band [Vaughan Williams]
5 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
